text: geudaedeul-ege jeontuga uimuhwadoeeossgo geugeos-eun geudaedeul-i kkeolyeohaneun geos-ila. geuleona geudaedeul-i kkeolyeohaneun geos-i geudaedeul-ege joh-eun geos-il su iss-eumyeo geudaedeul-i joh-ahaneun geos-i geudaedeul-ege nappeun geos-il su issnola. hananimkkeseoneun asina geudaedeul-eun alji moshanola
